price: Dájúdájú A sì máa fún yín ní ibùgbé lórí ilẹ̀ lẹ́yìn wọn. “ Ìyẹn wà fún ẹni tí ó bá páyà ìdúró (níwájú) Mi, tí ó tún páyà ìlérí Mi.
arabic: وَلَنُسۡكِنَنَّكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامِي وَخَافَ وَعِيدِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walanus'kinannakumu al-arḍa min baʿdihim dhālika liman khāfa maqāmī wakhāfa waʿīdi
translations: And surely We will make you dwell
